materials: Aluminum Cans; Aluminum; Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Ferrous Metals (Steel or Iron); Ni-Cd Batteries; Non-ferrous (Copper/Brass/Tin); Batteries (Rechargeable); Alkaline/Single-Use Batteries; Tin or Steel Cans; Car; Automobile Parts; Large Household Appliances; Clothes Hangers (Metal); Car Donation; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
Cans
Cans must be aluminum. 1 pound will be deducted for water and bag weight. Double bagged cans will not be accepted.
Aluminum Sheet
Sheet is aluminum is thin like sheeting off of trailer houses. Sheet with excess tar, paint or metal nails and screws will be considered as dirty Sheet" with a price that will be figured at time of delivery.

name: Clips is window frames and thicker aluminum pieces. Clips are less than 3 ft long and does not contain metal of any kind. Clips containing metal
region: or metal screen will be classed as "Dirty Clip" and prices will be figured at time of delivery.

name: We are buying batterys at this time.

Copper #1#1 is considered as copper that is thicker than a pencil lead. This is clean lead without insulation. This can be burnt and cannot contain any metal. Copper with coating and metal will be considered as Dirty Copper and will be assessed a differant price that will be figured at time of delivery.

#2 Copper is any solid copper that is thicker than a pencil lead. This also does not have insulation or metal parts and cannot contain solder. Any peices containing and parts that are not copper will be classed as Dirty #1 Copper and a price will be set on Delivery. Any mixed copper will be classed as #2. We will not separate copper.

Brass can be all types. Bathroom and sink fixtures and bushings. Any Brass that does not have any metal attached will be this price. Brass with metal attached will be considered as "Dirty Brass" and a price will be set at time of delivery.
Stainless Steel The only exception on stainless steel is that no iron can be attached. We do not accept Stainless Steel that has Iron Attached.
Brass Copper Radiators we buy cleaned
description: This is with all iron & Plastic Parts removed from the radiators"
